document_api_meta.title: Partial Edit Product
document_api_meta.env_desc:
Edit some properties (e.g. description, images, attributes) of a product that is not in the `FREEZE` or `DELETED` state.
After editing the product, the latest product content (referred to as v2) will be resent for audit review. If the audit passes, v2 is published to the shop, otherwise, the existing product stays live and remains unchanged (keeping v1). However, edits to the `price` or `inventory` fields do not require a reaudit and will be immediately published on the platform. Use the [Product status change](650956aff1fd3102b90b6261) webhook to keep track of the review status.
**Note**: 
- This API is applicable for all sellers.
- There may be a limit to the number of products you can relist per day. We recommend prioritizing key products first to ensure they get published. You can find your listing limit on the Seller Center homepage.
- If a draft or audit-review version exists, unedited fields will retain their values over those of the base (live) version.
- **Updates are handled per top-level property**, so all non-empty fields within an updated object must be supplied to prevent overwriting with blanks. For top-level properties (e.g. `description`, `brand_id`) that are not nested in an object, you can update them individually. Omitting these properties in the request will leave them unchanged. If you need to edit any nested property within an object, you must provide values for all nested properties of that object. Any omitted nested properties will be overwritten with blanks.
- If new mandatory product attributes were added by TikTok Shop after the creation of your product, ensure that you provide these attributes too.
**For global sellers**:
If you're using the local replication listing method, note the following sync rules:
**Sales attribute changes** (in sales attribute id/name) must be synced to other markets. Therefore, you must provide the `seller_sku` and complete `replicated_products` data. The API call will fail if you don't provide these details.
**New SKUs* (new sales attribute value id/name) are optional to sync to other markets. To sync, please provide the `seller_sku` and complete `replicated_products` data.
**General changes** are optional to sync to other markets. To sync, you only need to provide `replicated_products.region`.
**For Tokopedia sellers**:
Note that a product can have **only one active version** across all platforms at any time. If a product is live on both platforms, audit results for the latest version are handled as follows:
- **Mixed audit results**: If the product passes audit on one platform but fails on another, on the successful platform, the product will stay live and be updated with content from the latest version (v2), while on the failed platform, the product will be deactivated and hidden entirely.
- **Audit failure on all platforms**: If the product fails audit on all platforms, the existing product stays live and remains unchanged (keeping v1).

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: save_mode
request_body_param.desc:
Indicates how the product should be saved.
Possible values:
- AS_DRAFT: Save the product as a draft for future editing.
- LISTING: Immediately list the product in the shop.
Default: LISTING

**Note**: 
- Saving as draft is not supported in the following cases:
  - The product status is `DELETED`.
  - The product status is `PENDING` or `FREEZE` on any listing platform.
- If you are saving a post-live draft with `save_mode=AS_DRAFT`, `inventory` and `delivery_option_ids` fields are **not supported** and will not be saved.

request_body_param.name: description
request_body_param.desc: The product description in HTML format. **Note**: - The content must conform to the [HTML syntax](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/). All HTML tags are accepted but to optimize display on the TikTok Shop product detail page, the system will automatically convert certain tags into alternative formats, such as rendering `` tags as images. - Max length: 10,000 characters. - Image guidelines: You must use [TikTok Shop image URLs](6509df95defece02be598a22). Max 30 `` tags, each under 4000px with `src`, `width`, and `height` attributes. **Recommendations**: - If you are syncing a pre-existing description from another platform, include the full HTML source description here. - Provide a detailed description, ideally over 300 characters. - Include 3-5 key selling points, each under 250 characters, with supporting images. - Use 1600x1600 px for the image dimensions.

request_body_param.name: brand_id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the brand of this product. 
Use the [Get Brands API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6503075656e2bb0289dd5d01) to get the list of available brands for a shop.

**Note**: Unauthorized brands won't be displayed on TikTok Shop.

request_body_param.name: main_images
request_body_param.desc:
A list of images to display in the product image gallery.
-  Max count: 9
- Arrange your image URIs in the sequence that they should appear on TikTok Shop.
- Image dimensions: [300x300 px, 4000x4000 px]
  
**Recommendations**:
- Use a minimum of 5 images.
- The first image should have a white background. Use the [Optimize Images API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/665692b35d39dc02deb49a97) to change the background to white.

request_body_param.name: ^uri
request_body_param.desc:
The URI of the image.
Obtain this URI by uploading the images through the [Upload Product Image API](6509df95defece02be598a22)  with `use_case=MAIN_IMAGE`. You can use the returned URI directly, or process it through the [Optimize Images API](665692b35d39dc02deb49a97) first and use the resulting URI.

request_body_param.name: skus
request_body_param.desc:
A list of Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) used to identify distinct variants of the product.

**Note**:
- Max SKUs for BR, EU, JP, MX, UK, US: 300
- Max SKUs for other regions: 100

**Recommendations**: Place the most important variant at the beginning of the array.

request_body_param.name: ^id
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU ID generated by TikTok Shop. One product can contain multiple SKU IDs.

**Note**: 
- To edit an existing SKU, include its SKU ID.
- Any existing SKU IDs not listed here will result in the deletion of those SKUs. For example, if this product contains 5 SKUs and you only provide 2 SKU IDs, the remaining 3 will be deleted.
- To create new SKUs, leave the SKU ID blank and complete the other fields.

request_body_param.name: ^sales_attributes
request_body_param.desc:
A list of attributes  (e.g. size, color, length) that define each variant of a product.

**Note**: 
- You must retain at least 1 sales attribute, deleting all existing sales attributes is not allowed.
- You can only have up to 3 types of sales attributes per product.
- Each SKU must include the same number and type of sales attributes. For example, you cannot have one SKU that has only a Color attribute, while another SKU has both Color and Size attributes.
- Provide either a built-in ID or a custom name; if both are provided, the ID takes priority.
- The `id/name` and `value_id/value_name` pairs must be unique in each SKU. For example, you cannot repeat `"name": "Color"`, `"value_name": "Red"` in different SKUs.

request_body_param.name: ^^id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the sales attribute.
This is either a built-in sales attribute ID from [Get Attributes API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c5784a0bb702c0561cc8) or a custom attribute ID returned after calling [Create Product API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6502fc8da57708028b42b18a).

request_body_param.name: ^^name
request_body_param.desc:
A self-defined custom sales attribute name if the existing attributes do not satisfy your needs. The system will auto-generate an ID after editing.

**Note**: 
- Do not include sensitive characters.
- Max length: 20 characters

request_body_param.name: ^^value_id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the sales attribute value.
This is either a built-in sales attribute value ID from [Get Attributes API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c5784a0bb702c0561cc8) or a custom sales attribute value ID returned after calling [Create Product API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6502fc8da57708028b42b18a).

request_body_param.name: ^^value_name
request_body_param.desc:
A self-defined custom sales attribute value if the existing values do not satisfy your needs. The system will auto-generate an ID after editing.

**Note**:
- No duplicates allowed under the same attribute.
- Max length: 50 characters.

request_body_param.name: ^^sku_img
request_body_param.desc:
The default/main image for each value (e.g. red) of the primary sales attribute (e.g. color). This appears in the product options gallery on TikTok Shop.

You can attach images to only 1 type of sales attribute, which will serve as the primary attribute for display. An image must be provided for each value of the primary attribute. For example, if a product has 2 colors and 3 sizes, you can choose to attach images for either the color sales attribute or the size sales attribute. If you choose to attach images for color, you must attach 2 images, one for each color. If you want to add more images, use `supplementary_sku_images`.

request_body_param.name: ^^^uri
request_body_param.desc:
The URI of the image.
Obtain this URI by uploading the images through the [Upload Product Image API](6509df95defece02be598a22)  with `use_case=ATTRIBUTE_IMAGE`.

request_body_param.name: ^^supplementary_sku_images
request_body_param.desc:
A list of supplementary images for each value (e.g. red) of the primary sales attribute (e.g. color) to provide multiple views or details of the product for that attribute value. These appear in the product options gallery on TikTok Shop.

**Note**:
- Max number of image URIs: 8.
- Arrange your image URIs in the sequence that they should appear on TikTok Shop.
- Applicable only for the US market.

request_body_param.name: ^^^uri
request_body_param.desc:
The URI of the image.
Obtain this URI by uploading the images through the [Upload Product Image API](6509df95defece02be598a22)  with `use_case=ATTRIBUTE_IMAGE`.

request_body_param.name: ^seller_sku
request_body_param.desc:
An internal code/name for managing SKUs, not visible to buyers.  
- Valid length: 1-50 characters
- Format: Text without spaces

request_body_param.name: ^price
request_body_param.desc: SKU pricing information.

request_body_param.name: ^^amount
request_body_param.desc:
**Local sellers/Intra-EU sellers**
The SKU's **local display price** shown on the product page before any discounts. Refer to [Product Pricing](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67e1288d76cfee049d9af858) for the allowed price ranges in each market.

request_body_param.name: ^^currency
request_body_param.desc:
The currency.
Possible values based on the region:
- BRL: Brazil
- EUR: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain
- GBP: United Kingdom
- IDR: Indonesia
- JPY: Japan
- MXN: Mexico
- MYR: Malaysia
- PHP: Philippines
- SGD: Singapore
- THB: Thailand
- USD: United States
- VND: Vietnam

request_body_param.name: ^^sale_price
request_body_param.desc:
**Global sellers**
The SKU's **local display price** shown on the product page before any discounts. 
Refer to [Product Pricing](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67e1288d76cfee049d9af858) for the allowed price ranges in each market.

**Note**: 
- Applicable for all global sellers.
- Required for JP and US shops using China warehouses. Optional for others.
- This is the definitive final price shown on the product page, all other prices will be ignored.

request_body_param.name: ^identifier_code
request_body_param.desc:
A regulated identifier code assigned to a product based on international standardized regulations (e.g. GTIN) to ensure the product is universally identifiable across various platforms and systems.

**Note**: Editable only if the product is in DRAFT state. Otherwise, changes are not allowed.

request_body_param.name: ^^code
request_body_param.desc:
The identifier code.

**Format**:
- GTIN: 14 digits 
- EAN: 8, 13, or 14 digits 
- UPC: 12 digits 
- ISBN: 13 digits, or 9 digits ending in capital `X`
- JAN: 8 or 13 digits
**Note**: The identifier code must be unique for each SKU, with no repetition allowed.

request_body_param.name: ^^type
request_body_param.desc:
The type of identifier code.
Possible values:
- GTIN
- EAN
- UPC
- ISBN
- JAN

request_body_param.name: ^inventory
request_body_param.desc:
SKU inventory information.
**Note**: If you are saving a post-live draft with `save_mode=AS_DRAFT`, this field is not supported and will not be saved. When using Get Product to retrieve the draft, the values will reflect those in the base version.

request_body_param.name: ^^warehouse_id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the warehouse where the SKU is stored. 
Retrieve the list of warehouses available for your shop from the [Get Warehouse List API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650aa418defece02be6e66b6).

request_body_param.name: ^^quantity
request_body_param.desc:
The total SKU quantity available in the warehouse.
Valid range: [1, 99,999]

Note: This quantity specifically refers to the in-stock inventory that can be shipped immediately.

request_body_param.name: ^^backorder_quantity
request_body_param.desc:
The `backorder_quantity` will automatically be converted to `quantity` once in-stock inventory is sold out. The fulfillment of this inventory follows the `handling_time` specified below.
Note: Made-to-order (MTO), pre-order, and custom products cannot be backordered, and thus are incompatible with backorder_quantity.

request_body_param.name: ^^handling_time
request_body_param.desc: The estimated number of working days needed for a backorder to be shipped. Currently, different warehouses for the same SKU are not allowed to have different `handling_time`

request_body_param.name: ^external_sku_id
request_body_param.desc:
An external identifier used in an external ecommerce platform. This is used to associate the SKU between TikTok Shop and the external ecommerce platform. 
Max length: 999 characters

request_body_param.name: ^sku_unit_count
request_body_param.desc:
The total quantity/volume of the product represented by the SKU.
For example, if the SKU represents 500ml of water, this value would be 500 if the unit type is defined as ml.
Valid range: [0.01, 99,999.9999] 
Applicable only for the EU market.

**Note**: 
- This is mainly used to calculate the unit price of the SKU, and is required only if you wish to display the unit price to facilitate easier price comparisons across different products and packaging sizes.
- Unit price = Selling price/(SKU unit count/base unit count). Therefore if you want to obtain the unit price, you would also need to define the "base unit count" and the "unit type" product attributes. Retrieve the relevant information for these product attributes by using the [Get Attributes API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c5784a0bb702c0561cc8). The unit price would then be returned in the [Get Product API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509d85b4a0bb702c057fdda).

request_body_param.name: ^extra_identifier_codes
request_body_param.desc:
If the SKU belongs to a virtual bundle (containing multiple individual SKUs), you can add up to 10 additional identifier codes here for the SKUs included in the bundle.

**Format**:
GTIN: 14 digits 
EAN: 8, 13, or 14 digits 
UPC: 12 digits 
ISBN: 13 digits, or 9 digits ending in capital `X`

**Note**: 
- Applicable only for the EU market. 
- The identifier code must be unique for each SKU, with no repetition allowed.

request_body_param.name: ^list_price
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU's list price information. This is equivalent to the manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP), or the recommended retail price (RRP).
Applicable only for the US market.

**Note**: This value may appear as the strikethrough price on the product page. However, whether the strikethrough price is shown and the amount shown are subject to the audit team's review and decision based on various pricing information.

request_body_param.name: ^^amount
request_body_param.desc:
The price amount.
Valid range: [0.01, 7600]


**Note**: 
- The value must be equal to or greater than `skus.price.amount`. Otherwise, it will be discarded.
- If the value is verified to be legitimate by the audit team, it will be stored and returned in the [Get Product API](6509d85b4a0bb702c057fdda).

request_body_param.name: ^^currency
request_body_param.desc:
The currency.
Possible values: USD

request_body_param.name: ^external_list_prices
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU list price (e.g. MSRP, RRP) or original price information on external ecommerce platforms.
Applicable only for selected sellers in the US market.

**Note**: This value may appear as the strikethrough price on the product page. However, whether the strikethrough price is shown and the amount shown are subject to the audit team's review and decision based on various pricing information.

request_body_param.name: ^^source
request_body_param.desc:
The external ecommerce platform from which the price is sourced.
Possible values:
- SHOPIFY_COMPARE_AT_PRICE: The compare_at_price in Shopify.

request_body_param.name: ^^amount
request_body_param.desc:
The price amount.
Valid range: [0.01, 7600]

request_body_param.name: ^^currency
request_body_param.desc:
The currency.
Possible values: USD

request_body_param.name: ^pre_sale
request_body_param.desc:
SKU presale information, used to tag a product as a presale product based on its presale type.
Applicable only if `allowed_special_product_types` from [Get Category Rules](6509c0febace3e02b74594a9) is not empty.

**Rules for the US market**:
- Regular / Preorder product: Once the product goes live, you cannot change the product type.
- Made-to-order product: You can change it to a regular product at any time.

request_body_param.name: ^^type
request_body_param.desc:
The type of pre-sale.
Possible values based on the region:
**US**
- `PRE_ORDER`: The product is not yet available or released. Fulfillment can be extended by specifying a **release date**.
- `MADE_TO_ORDER`: The product is produced only after the order is received. Fulfillment can be extended by specifying a **duration**.
- `CUSTOM`: The product requires a fulfillment timeline that exceeds the standard due to other factors. Fulfillment can be extended by specifying a **duration**.

**UK, EU, SEA, JP, and LATAM**
- `PRE_ORDER`: The product is not yet available or released. Fulfillment can be extended by specifying a **duration**.

request_body_param.name: ^^fulfillment_type
request_body_param.desc:
Information about the type of pre-sale order fulfillment and the corresponding timeframe.
- `handling_duration_days` is for fulfillment with an extended duration.
- `release_date` is for starting fulfillment on a fixed date.

**Note**: Provide either the `handling_duration_days` or the `release_date`, depending on the value of `pre_sale.type` and your shop's region.

request_body_param.name: ^^^handling_duration_days
request_body_param.desc:
The desired duration for handling a pre-sale order and handing it over to a shipping carrier. 

Applicable only for the following regions and pre-sale type:
**US**
- `MADE_TO_ORDER`: Business days, from 3 to 14 days.
- `CUSTOM`: Business days, from 3 to 30 days.

**UK, EU, SEA, JP, and LATAM**
- `PRE_ORDER`: Calendar days, from 3 to 30 days.

request_body_param.name: ^^^release_date
request_body_param.desc:
The date on which the product gets converted into a regular product and becomes available for general purchase. On this date, order handling will also start, changing the status of the order to [`AWAITING_SHIPMENT`](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650b1b4bbace3e02b76d1011). 

Applicable only for `PRE_ORDER` in the US.
**Note**:
- Valid range: The date must fall within 3 - 60 days from the current date.
- This date is a unix timestamp (seconds) based on the seller-selected timezone in Seller Center.
- This date cannot be modified once the product goes live.

request_body_param.name: ^external_urls
request_body_param.desc:
A comma-delimited list of URLs for third-party product listing pages where consumers can place orders. Add this property if you have products listed on third-party sites other than TikTok Shop and would like to map them.
Max string length: 500

request_body_param.name: ^fees
request_body_param.desc: The fees required for this product based on TikTok Shop policies. Fees are required only for certain product categories, retrieve the requirements from the [Get Category Rules API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c0febace3e02b74594a9).

request_body_param.name: ^^type
request_body_param.desc:
The type of fee.
Possible values: PFAND

request_body_param.name: ^^amount
request_body_param.desc:
The fee amount.
Valid range:
- PFAND: [0.00 - 6300.00]

request_body_param.name: ^^additional_attribute
request_body_param.desc:
An optional attribute that provides additional context for the fee. The accepted values may vary by fee type and market.

Possible values for Pfand:
- SINGLE_USE
- REUSABLE
- NOT_APPLICABLE

request_body_param.name: title
request_body_param.desc:
The product title. 
Title length:
- DE, ES, FR, IE, IT, JP, UK, US: [1, 255] 
- BR, MX: [1, 300] 
- Other regions: [25, 255]

request_body_param.name: is_cod_allowed
request_body_param.desc:
A flag indicating whether to show the Cash On Delivery (COD) payment option during checkout. Use the [Get Category Rules API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c0febace3e02b74594a9) to check if COD is supported for your product category.

Applicable only for the following markets:
- Global sellers: MY, PH, SA, TH, VN
- Local sellers: ID, MY, PH, SA, TH, VN

**Note**: If COD is not supported, the listing will fail if you set this to `true`.

request_body_param.name: certifications
request_body_param.desc:
The list of certifications for your product.
Max count: 10

As per TikTok Shop guidelines, certifications are required for certain restricted product categories. Retrieve the certification requirements for your product from the  [Get Category Rules API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c0febace3e02b74594a9). Refer to [TikTok Shop Restricted Products Policy](https://seller-us.tiktok.com/university/essay?identity=1&role=1&knowledge_id=3238037484275457&from=policy) for information on product category restrictions.

request_body_param.name: ^id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID to identify the type of certification required for the product category.
Retrieve this value from the [Get Category Rules API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c0febace3e02b74594a9).

request_body_param.name: ^images
request_body_param.desc: A list of certification related images.

request_body_param.name: ^^uri
request_body_param.desc:
The URI of the image. 
Obtain this URI by uploading the images through the [Upload Product Image API](6509df95defece02be598a22)  with `use_case=CERTIFICATION_IMAGE`.

request_body_param.name: ^files
request_body_param.desc: A list of certification related files.

request_body_param.name: ^^id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the certification file.
Use the [Upload Product File API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509dffdc16ffe02b8dc10c5) to upload the files first and obtain the corresponding file ID.

request_body_param.name: ^^name
request_body_param.desc: The name of the certification file, including the file extension.

request_body_param.name: ^^format
request_body_param.desc: The format of the certification file. Only PDF is supported.

request_body_param.name: ^expiration_date
request_body_param.desc:
The expiration date of this certification expressed in unix timestamp (seconds) UTC+0.
This field may be required for certain certifications. Use the [Get Category Rules API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c0febace3e02b74594a9) to find out the requirements.

request_body_param.name: package_weight
request_body_param.desc:
The weight of the product package.

**Note**:
- Provide the weight measured after packing the product.
- This value impacts the shipping cost, so it is important to ensure that dimensions are accurate. Any discrepancies in measurements may lead to additional shipping fees.
- The package weight will take precedence over package dimensions in fee calculation if the fee based on weight is higher.

request_body_param.name: ^value
request_body_param.desc:
The package weight, which must be a positive number.
The number format varies based on the `unit`: 
- `GRAM`: integer
- `KILOGRAM`: up to 3 decimal places
- `POUND`: up to 2 decimal places

request_body_param.name: ^unit
request_body_param.desc:
The unit for the package weight.
Possible values based on region:
- US: `KILOGRAM`, `POUND`
- BR, JP, MX: `KILOGRAM`, `GRAM`
- Other countries: `KILOGRAM`

**Note**: You must use the same system of measurement (metric system or imperial system) for `package_weight` and `package_dimensions`. In other words, if you are using `KILOGRAM` for the weight, you must use `CENTIMETER` for the dimensions.

request_body_param.name: product_attributes
request_body_param.desc:
A list of general attributes (e.g. manufacturer, country of origin, materials used) that describe the product as a whole, regardless of variant. 

**Important**: The attributes available for use are determined by the system based on the product's assigned category, with some being mandatory. You must provide the product attributes marked as `is_required` in the response of the [Get Attributes API](6509c5784a0bb702c0561cc8) to avoid listing failure.

request_body_param.name: ^id
request_body_param.desc: The ID of the product attribute, retrieved from the [Get Attributes API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c5784a0bb702c0561cc8).

request_body_param.name: ^values
request_body_param.desc:
A list of selectable values for the product attribute.

**Note**: Provide either a built-in ID or a custom name; if both are provided, the ID takes priority.

request_body_param.name: ^^id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the product attribute value.
This is either a built-in product attribute value ID from [Get Attributes API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c5784a0bb702c0561cc8) or a custom product attribute value ID returned after calling [Create Product API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6502fc8da57708028b42b18a).

request_body_param.name: ^^name
request_body_param.desc:
A self-defined custom product attribute value if the existing values do not satisfy your needs. The system will auto-generate an ID after editing.

**Note**:
- No duplicates allowed under the same attribute.
- Max length: 2000 characters.

request_body_param.name: size_chart
request_body_param.desc:
The measurement details of the product to help buyers find the right size.

**Note**: 
- For certain product categories, size charts may be required or not supported. Use the [Get Category Rules API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c0febace3e02b74594a9) to check the requirements.
-  If size charts are not supported, even if you provide a size chart here, the size chart will not be saved.
- Provide either a TikTok Shop size chart template ID or a size chart image; if both are provided, the ID takes priority.

request_body_param.name: ^image
request_body_param.desc:
An image of the size chart.

**Recommendations**:
- Resolution: Minimum 1024px on the shorter side
- Content: Include key measurement dimensions (e.g., bust, waist, hips, inseam), the more the better.
- Format: Use a table with distinct columns and row.
  - Use only one table per product and image.
  - Display each dimension in a separate row.
  - Display units in column headers.

request_body_param.name: ^^uri
request_body_param.desc:
The URI of the size chart image.
Obtain this URI by uploading the images through the [Upload Product Image API](6509df95defece02be598a22)  with `use_case=SIZE_CHART_IMAGE`.

request_body_param.name: ^template
request_body_param.desc: A TikTok Shop size chart template generated by the size chart tool in Seller Center > Manage Products > Bulk action > Batch manage size charts.

request_body_param.name: ^^id
request_body_param.desc: The size chart template ID.

request_body_param.name: package_dimensions
request_body_param.desc:
The dimensions of the product package.

**Note**:
- Provide the dimensions measured after packing the product.
- These values impact the shipping cost, so it is important to ensure that dimensions are accurate. Any discrepancies in measurements may lead to additional shipping fees.
- Optional for ID, TH, VN regions.

request_body_param.name: ^length
request_body_param.desc:
The package length. A positive whole number.
**Note**: For the BR market, decimal values using `.` or `,` as separators are also accepted but will be rounded to the nearest whole number.

request_body_param.name: ^width
request_body_param.desc:
The package width. A positive whole number.
**Note**: For the BR market, decimal values using `.` or `,` as separators are also accepted but will be rounded to the nearest whole number.

request_body_param.name: ^height
request_body_param.desc:
The package height. A positive whole number.
**Note**: For the BR market, decimal values using `.` or `,` as separators are also accepted but will be rounded to the nearest whole number.

request_body_param.name: ^unit
request_body_param.desc:
The unit for the package dimensions.
Possible values based on region:
- US: CENTIMETER, INCH
- Other regions: CENTIMETER
  
**Note**: You must use the same system of measurement (metric system or imperial system) for `package_weight` and `package_dimensions`. In other words, if you are using KILOGRAM for the weight, you must use CENTIMETER for the dimensions.

request_body_param.name: video
request_body_param.desc:
A product introduction or promotion video to display for your product.

**Recommendations**:
- Aspect ratio: 1:1 
- Resolution: HD 720p or higher
- Duration: 20 - 60 seconds

request_body_param.name: ^id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the product video.
Use the [Upload Product File API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509dffdc16ffe02b8dc10c5) to upload the video first and obtain the corresponding file ID.

request_body_param.name: external_product_id
request_body_param.desc:
An external identifier used in an external ecommerce platform. This is used to associate the product between TikTok Shop and the external ecommerce platform. 
Max length: 999 characters

request_body_param.name: manufacturer_ids
request_body_param.desc:
A comma-delimited list of manufacturer IDs. Retrieve the IDs from the [Search Manufacturers API](67066a580dcee902fa03ccf9).

**Note**: Applicable only for the EU market in certain categories. Use the [Get Category Rules API](6509c0febace3e02b74594a9) to check the requirements.

request_body_param.name: responsible_person_ids
request_body_param.desc:
A comma-delimited list of responsible person IDs. Retrieve the IDs from the [Search Responsible Persons API](67066a55f17b7d02f95d2fb1).

**Note**: Applicable only for the EU market in certain categories. Use the [Get Category Rules API](6509c0febace3e02b74594a9) to check the requirements.

request_body_param.name: listing_platforms
request_body_param.desc:
The platforms for listing the product.
Possible values:
- TOKOPEDIA
- TIKTOK_SHOP
Applicable only for sellers that migrated from Tokopedia.

**IMPORTANT**: This field controls the product's visibility on the listing platforms.
- If the product is live on both platforms but the request contains only 1 platform, the product will be deactivated and hidden from the omitted platform.
- If the product is live on 1 platform but the request contains a different platform, the product will be deactivated and hidden from the omitted platform.
- If you want to deactivate the product on both platforms, use the Deactivate Product API.

request_body_param.name: replicated_products
request_body_param.desc:
The list of local market replicas to which updates should be synced. As this is a partial edit endpoint, only updated fields will be synced.
**Compulsory sync**
- **Sales attribute changes** (in sales attribute id/name) must be synced to other markets. Therefore, you must provide the `seller_sku` above and complete the details in this object. The API call will fail if you don't provide these details.
**Optional sync**
- **New SKUs* (new sales attribute value id/name) are optional to sync to other markets. To sync, please provide the `seller_sku` above and complete the details in this object.
- **General changes** are optional to sync to other markets. To sync, you only need to provide `replicated_products.region`.

request_body_param.name: ^region
request_body_param.desc:
The market where you want to sync the changes to. The market must already contain a replica. Use the Get Global Replicated Products to check the markets that contain a replica.
Possible values:
- DE: Germany
- ES: Spain
- FR: France
- GB: United Kingdom
- ID: Indonesia
- IE: Ireland
- IT: Italy
- JP: Japan
- MY: Malaysia
- PH: Philippines
- SG: Singapore
- TH: Thailand
- US: United States
- VN: Vietnam

request_body_param.name: ^skus
request_body_param.desc:
The SKUs to be synced to the specified market.
Specify this **only if** you are adding SKUs or changing the sales attribute id/name.
**Note**:
- You must pass in all existing SKUs. Any existing SKU IDs not listed here will result in the deletion of those SKUs. For example, if this product contains 5 SKUs and you only provide 2 SKU IDs, the remaining 3 will be deleted.
- To create new SKUs, leave the SKU ID blank and provide the seller_sku.

request_body_param.name: ^^id
request_body_param.desc: The SKU ID generated by TikTok Shop. Provide this for existing SKUs

request_body_param.name: ^^seller_sku
request_body_param.desc:
The seller_sku value of the source product above.
- Valid length: 1-50 characters
- Format: Text without spaces

request_body_param.name: ^^price
request_body_param.desc: The SKU's **local display price** shown on the product page before any discounts

request_body_param.name: ^^^currency
request_body_param.desc:
The currency. You must specify the local currency in the target market.
Possible values:
- EUR: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain
- GBP: United Kingdom
- IDR: Indonesia
- JPY: Japanese
- MYR: Malaysia
- PHP: Philippines
- SGD: Singapore
- THB: Thailand
- USD: United States
- VND: Vietnam

request_body_param.name: ^^^sale_price
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU's local display price shown on the product page before any discounts. 
Refer to Product Pricing for the allowed price ranges in each market.

request_body_param.name: ^^inventory
request_body_param.desc: SKU inventory information per warehouse.

request_body_param.name: ^^^warehouse_id
request_body_param.desc: The warehouse ID. Retrieve this value from the [Get Warehouse List API](650aa418defece02be6e66b6) or Get Inventory Rules API.

request_body_param.name: ^^^quantity
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU quantity available in the warehouse.
Valid range: [1, 999,999]

request_body_param.name: ^^external_sku_id
request_body_param.desc:
An external identifier used in an external ecommerce platform. This is used to associate the SKU between TikTok Shop and the external ecommerce platform. 
Max length: 999 characters

request_body_param.name: subscribe_info_edit
request_body_param.desc: All of the Save and Subscribe discount details.

request_body_param.name: ^subscribe_status
request_body_param.desc:
An enum outlining whether the given product has an active Subscribe and Save promotion:
- ENABLED
- NOT_ENABLED

This field is required if the subscription is being created or modified.

request_body_param.name: ^discount_details
request_body_param.desc: All of the Save and Subscribe discount details.

request_body_param.name: ^^discount_level
request_body_param.desc:
An enum that communicated the type of discount:
- REGULAR
- FIRST_ORDER
- RETENTION

request_body_param.name: ^^discount_value
request_body_param.desc: The value of the discount. A value of 10, would indicate a 10% discount

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^product_id
response_param.desc: The product ID generated by TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^skus
response_param.desc: A list of Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) used to identify distinct variants of the product.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The SKU ID generated by TikTok Shop. One product can contain multiple SKU IDs.

response_param.name: ^^seller_sku
response_param.desc: An internal code/name for managing SKUs, not visible to buyers.

response_param.name: ^^sales_attributes
response_param.desc: A list of attributes  (e.g. size, color, length) that define each variant of a product.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc:
The sales attribute ID. 
If you included the custom sales attribute name in the request, this is a newly generated ID.

response_param.name: ^^^value_id
response_param.desc:
The sales attribute value ID. 
If you included the custom sales attribute value name in the request, this is a newly generated ID.

response_param.name: ^^external_sku_id
response_param.desc: An external identifier used in an external ecommerce platform. This is used to associate the SKU between TikTok Shop and the external ecommerce platform.

response_param.name: ^^fees
response_param.desc: The fees required for this product based on TikTok Shop policies. Fees are required only for certain product categories, retrieve the requirements from the [Get Category Rules API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c0febace3e02b74594a9).

response_param.name: ^^^type
response_param.desc:
The type of fee.
Possible values: PFAND

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc:
The fee amount.
Valid range:
- PFAND: [0.00 - 6300.00]

response_param.name: ^^^additional_attribute
response_param.desc:
An optional attribute that provides additional context for the fee. The accepted values may vary by fee type and market.

Possible values for Pfand:
- SINGLE_USE
- REUSABLE
- NOT_APPLICABLE

response_param.name: ^audit
response_param.desc:
Product audit information.
**Note**: Applicable only to products listed on TikTok Shop. Not applicable for products listed only on Tokopedia.

response_param.name: ^^status
response_param.desc:
The product audit status.
Possible values:
- NONE: The product is not applicable for audit because it has not been submitted for listing on this platform, or it is in a draft, frozen, or deactivated state.
- AUDITING: The product is currently being audited.
- APPROVED: If you only edited the `price` or `inventory` fields of an approved product, the product remains approved and the edits are immediately published on the platform.

edit fields limit

The title must follow these formatting rules: it cannot contain HTML escape characters (e.g.,  ), emojis, or ASCII control characters (e.g., \u007F). It also cannot consist solely of symbols (e.g., //// or !@#$$$&), nor can it have more than 9 consecutive repeated characters (e.g., aaaaaaaaa or 111111111).

The description must follow these formatting rules: it cannot contain HTML escape characters (e.g.,  ), emojis, or ASCII control characters (e.g., \\u007F). It also cannot consist solely of symbols (e.g., //// or !@#$$$&), nor can it have more than 9 consecutive repeated characters (e.g., aaaaaaaaa or 111111111).

Sales attribute names must follow these formatting rules: it cannot contain HTML escape characters (e.g.,  ), emojis, or ASCII control characters (e.g., \u007F). It also cannot consist solely of symbols (e.g., //// or !@#$$$&), nor can it have more than 9 consecutive repeated characters (e.g., aaaaaaaaa or 111111111).

Sales attribute value names must follow these formatting rules: it cannot contain HTML escape characters (e.g.,  ), emojis, or ASCII control characters (e.g., \\u007F). It also cannot consist solely of symbols (e.g., //// or !@#$$$&), nor can it have more than 9 consecutive repeated characters (e.g., aaaaaaaaa or 111111111).

Product attribute value names must follow these formatting rules: it cannot contain HTML escape characters (e.g.,  ), emojis, or ASCII control characters (e.g., \\u007F). It also cannot consist solely of symbols (e.g., //// or !@#$$$&), nor can it have more than 9 consecutive repeated characters (e.g., aaaaaaaaa or 111111111).

sample_code.label: Curl
Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func product202509PartialEditProductPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.ProductV202509API.Product202509ProductsProductIdPartialEditPost(context.Background(), "1729409636071801988")
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBody := product_v202509.NewProduct202509PartialEditProductRequestBody()
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBody.SetSaveMode("AS_DRAFT")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBody.SetDescription(" ")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBody.SetBrandId("7082427311584347905")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodyMainImages := product_v202509.NewProduct202509PartialEditProductRequestBodyMainImages()
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodyMainImages.SetUri("tos-maliva-i-o3syd03w52-us/c668cdf70b7f483c94dbe")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodyMainImagesList := []product_v202509.Product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodyMainImages{*product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodyMainImages}
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBody.SetMainImages(product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodyMainImagesList)
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkus := product_v202509.NewProduct202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkus()
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkus.SetId("1729592969712207012")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributes := product_v202509.NewProduct202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributes()
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributes.SetId("100089")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributes.SetName("Specification")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributes.SetValueId("1729592969712207000")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributes.SetValueName("XL")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesSkuImg := product_v202509.NewProduct202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesSkuImg()
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesSkuImg.SetUri("tos-maliva-i-o3syd03w52-us/c668cdf70b7f483c94dbe")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributes.SetSkuImg(*product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesSkuImg)
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesSupplementarySkuImages := product_v202509.NewProduct202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesSupplementarySkuImages()
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesSupplementarySkuImages.SetUri("tos-maliva-i-o3syd03w52-us/c668cdf70b7f483c94dbe")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesSupplementarySkuImagesList := []product_v202509.Product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesSupplementarySkuImages{*product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesSupplementarySkuImages}
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributes.SetSupplementarySkuImages(product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesSupplementarySkuImagesList)
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesList := []product_v202509.Product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributes{*product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributes}
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkus.SetSalesAttributes(product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusSalesAttributesList)
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkus.SetSellerSku("seller sku xxaa")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusPrice := product_v202509.NewProduct202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusPrice()
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusPrice.SetAmount("100.00")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusPrice.SetCurrency("USD")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusPrice.SetSalePrice("1.21")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkus.SetPrice(*product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusPrice)
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusIdentifierCode := product_v202509.NewProduct202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusIdentifierCode()
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusIdentifierCode.SetCode("12345678901234")
    product202509PartialEditProductRequestBodySkusIdentifierCode.SetType("GTIN")

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to manage seller's product information, by having access to listing of products, to edit product attributes, to change product status and to sync product inventory, etc.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to manage your product information, by having access to listing of products, to edit product attributes, to change product status and to sync product inventory, etc.

request_path_param.desc: The product ID in TikTok Shop.
